body:
i'm thankful that i got to do a task at work to help a customer that was also really fun for me and then everybody made a big deal about how great it was that i did it. i'm thankful to have gotten to talk to a coworker about our mutual love of kourtney kardashian.

i'm thankful for blackberries and banana and honey bunches of oats.

i'm thankful that this morning, when i was not feeling it on the treadmill, i just let myself get off, and though i'm thankful to exercise almost every day, i'm also thankful to let myself take a break when i feel like one.

i'm thankful that though it was supposed to be warmer this weekend and now isn't, it's now supposed to be warmer next week.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that i got to do a task at work to help a customer that was also really fun for me and then everybody made a big deal about how great it was that i did it. i'm thankful to have gotten to talk to a coworker about our mutual love of kourtney kardashian.

i'm thankful for blackberries and banana and honey bunches of oats.

i'm thankful that this morning, when i was not feeling it on the treadmill, i just let myself get off, and though i'm thankful to exercise almost every day, i'm also thankful to let myself take a break when i feel like one.

i'm thankful that though it was supposed to be warmer this weekend and now isn't, it's now supposed to be warmer next week.
